title: Deep Learning
description: This course will cover the fundamental underpinnings and practice of deep learning, including neural network architectures, optimization algorithms, and applications to perception and Artificial Intelligence.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2605 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (CS 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 2261 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (CS 3510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 3511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
